title: Ticket #2280: ssh_to_job fails with openssh 5.8
description:
Recent versions of openssh (e.g. 5.6-5.8) close all fds > 2, so condor_ssh_to_job is broken, because it relies on inheritance of the ssh connection fd through ssh to the proxy command.

I have observed this in Fedora 15.

One possible solution is to pass the ssh connection fd over a named socket from ssh_to_job to the ssh proxy command (which is another instance of ssh_to_job).
